name: Doudou Quest
description:
[French only, sorry! However you don't need to understand any of the dialogues to enjoy the game].

Monsters are invading Charlie and Ophélie's house. Find all their plushes so they can survive the night!

Controls:
- MOBILE: tap a room to move, tap twice to rotate a room
- DESKTOP: Click/Arrow keys/WASD to move, right click to rotate a room, Spacebar to call Ophélie
